hello , my ad Campaign ID:1940747663525453826 is active but not running and i dont understand why

Hey there! Let's figure out why your ad campaign isn't running. Could you provide me with some details like the campaign start date, bidding type, targeting or budget settings, and any recent changes in the last 72 hours? This will help us pinpoint the issue.
it never started but keeps having a warning saying it needs an Event , what is that exactly and do you need one to have the ad running .. the start date was last friday to Monday but it never started

It sounds like your campaign requires event tracking to function properly. Event tracking is essential for conversion event bidding strategies, which help optimize your ad performance. Without it, the system might not be able to track conversions effectively, leading to issues with your ad running.

To set up event tracking, you can use either a Pixel or Postback method. The Pixel is generally easier to set up and provides insights into user behavior. If your website journey is more complex, you might consider using Postback.

For more detailed guidance on setting up event tracking, you can refer to our [Event Tracking Guide](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/17827591199757-Introduction-to-tCPA). Let me know if you need further assistance!
